Name: The Neutral Ground
Ingredients: 50 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Sweet Manhattan -like with sherry and spiced notes.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Rhiannon Enlil at Bar Tonique in New Orleans, USA and named after the Median area on Canal Street in New Orleans that formerly separated the American district from the Spanish/French district (now known as the French quarter).
Nutrition: One serving of The Neutral Ground contains 176 calories
